summary.p: This critical edition of the Dānakāṇḍa section of the Kṛtyakalpataru — a 12th century dharmanibandha — was the 2009 doctoral thesis of David James Brick, at the University of Texas at Austin. It was later published as part of the Harvard Oriental Series.

listBibl.bibl: Brick, David James, ed. & trans. 2009. The Dānakāṇḍa (‘Book on Gifting’) of the Kṛtyakalpataru: A Critical Edition and Annotated Translation. PhD thesis, University of Texas at Austin.

encodingDesc.p: Variant readings from the Caturvargacintāmaṇi ("Hem") have not been transcribed.

lg.l: mahatāṃ sūkṣmadehānāṃmahatā sūkṣmadehānāṃmahādhyāsaktadehānāṃ tathā ca vyādhitātmanāmvyādhibhṛtāṃ nṛṇāṃ |
hiṃsrāṇāṃhiṃsāyāḥ saumyamūrtīnāṃsaumyamūrtināṃsādhumūrtīnāṃ sarvathāsarvadasarvajā hy abhayātabhayāubhayāt phalam || Hem 946
na tu viprasahasrasyasahasrebhyo gosahasraṃdadyād dānaṃ sadakṣiṇamsadākṣaṇam || Hem 946
lobhādlobhā dveṣād bhayād vāpidveṣād upād vāpi yas tyajec charaṇāgatam |
brahmahatyāsamaṃ tasyabrahmahatyāsahasrasya pāpam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ || Hem 947
prāṇinaṃprāṇināṃ vadhyamānaṃradhyamānaṃ hi yaḥ śaktaḥśakraḥ samupekṣatesamupekṣyate |
sa yāti narakaṃ ghoram iti prāhuridam āhuritim āhuridam ākur manīṣiṇaḥ || Hem 947
sattvebhyosa - ebhyosarvebhyosattve sasattvebhya hy abhayaṃ yasyayaś catasya tayor abhayado 'dhikaḥtayor adhikadehikaḥ || Hem 947
